name: ArcherGames: Death is a New Beginning
name_original: ArcherGames: Death is a New Beginning
description:
This Game was submitted to the Kindred Community Game Jam. A Platformer Game that was made in 3 to 4 days using the theme "Death is a new beginning"

The game is short but a lot of effort was put into this. The game was made by just me ( Archer833x ) but the music was made by a friend of mine Federico Nocioni, you can find his soundcloud here - https://soundcloud.com/federico-nocioni

Controls:    WASD: Walk/Move    E: Interact/Pick up objects     Spacebar: Jump

Contacts: Archer8339@gmail.com     Twitter: @archer8339      

Finally I hope everyone had a good time making some games, this personally was stressful but in the end it was really fun and I look forward for future jams. 

Stay safe everyone!
